BG.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
BG.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
BR.description: Street Fighter™ II marcou a indústria de jogos nos anos 90, revolucionando os jogos do gênero de luta. Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting, considerado um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, foi o terceiro e o último lançamento das séries originais de Street Fighter II. O jogo apresenta os oito lutadores originais, juntamente com os chefões Balrog, Sagat e M. Bison, como personagens com os quais você pode jogar. Além disso, oferece maior velocidade nas lutas e melhor equilíbrio nas habilidades dos personagens.

AT.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
AT.description: In den 1990ern hat Street Figher II™ einen Standard für Videospiele gesetzt und so das Genre der Kampfspiele revolutioniert. Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting gilt als eines der besten Spiele aller Zeiten und ist der dritte und letzte Ableger der originalen Street Fighter II-Reihe. Mit den acht ursprünglichen Kämpfern wie z. B. Ryu, Chun-Li und Guile und den spielbaren Endgegnern Balrog, Vega, Sagat und M. Bison bietet Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting erweitertes Gameplay und eine verbesserte Ausbalancierung der Charaktere. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CA.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
CA.description: Street Fighter™ II defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionizing the fighting game genre. Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting, regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, was the third and final release of the original Street Fighter II series. The original eight world warriors are featured, along with playable boss characters Balrog, Sagat, and M. Bison. The game offered enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing.

CY.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
CY.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
BE.description: Street Fighter II™ a révolutionné l'univers du jeu de combat dans les années 90. Considéré comme l'un des meilleurs jeux de tous les temps, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting est le troisième volet de la série originale Street Fighter II à être sorti. Incluant les huit combattants originaux, dont Ryu, Chun-Li et Guile, mais aussi des boss jouables comme Balrog, Vega, Sagat et M. Bison, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offre un gameplay amélioré et des personnages à la puissance plus équilibrée. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CZ.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting

IE.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting

IT.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
IT.description: Street Fighter II™ è il gioco che ha rivoluzionato l'universo dei picchiaduro negli anni 90. Considerato come uno dei più grandi titoli di tutti i tempi, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting è il terzo episodio della serie Street Fighter II originale. Grazie alla presenza degli otto lottatori originali (tra cui Ryu, Chun-Li e Guile) e dei grandi boss con cui poter giocare (Balrog, Vega, Sagat e M. Bison), questo titolo offre un'azione di gioco frenetica e personaggi bilanciati. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
ES.description: Street Fighter II™ revolucionó el género de juegos de lucha en los 90. Considerado uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting fue el tercero de la saga Street Fighter II. Además de los ocho luchadores internacionales entre los que se encuentran Ryu, Chun-Li y Guile, también podrás jugar con los jefes Balrog, Vega, Sagat y M. Bison. Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting ofrece una jugabilidad impecable y un control de los personajes optimizado. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

LT.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
LT.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
MX.description: Street Fighter™ II definió a la industria de los videojuegos en la década de los noventa al revolucionar el género de pelea. Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting, considerado uno de los mejores juegos de todos los tiempos, fue el tercer y último lanzamiento de la serie original de Street Fighter II. Este juego incluye los ocho guerreros originales y la posibilidad de elegir a los personajes jefes Balrog, Sagat y M. Bison. El juego ofrece un incremento en la velocidad de juego y mejoras en el balance de los personajes.

LU.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
LU.description: Street Fighter II™ a révolutionné l'univers du jeu de combat dans les années 90. Considéré comme l'un des meilleurs jeux de tous les temps, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting est le troisième volet de la série originale Street Fighter II à être sorti. Incluant les huit combattants originaux, dont Ryu, Chun-Li et Guile, mais aussi des boss jouables comme Balrog, Vega, Sagat et M. Bison, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offre un gameplay amélioré et des personnages à la puissance plus équilibrée. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

MT.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
MT.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

NO.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
NO.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
NL.description: Street Fighter II™ definieerde gaming in de jaren 90 door het vechtgenre radicaal te veranderen. Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting, dat wordt gezien als een van de beste vechtspellen aller tijde, is het derde deel in de originele Street Fighter II-reeks. De originele achtkoppige cast met onder andere Ryu, Chun-Li en Guile plus de speelbare eindbazen Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison verschijnt ten tonele. Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting biedt aangepaste gameplay en een verbeterde balans. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
NZ.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

DK.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
DK.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
RU.description: В девяностых годах появление Street Fighter II™ перевернуло представление о жанре файтинга, а третья и последняя игра этой серии Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting заслужила звание одной из лучших игр в истории. Игрок может управлять одним из восьми воинов, среди которых Ryu, Chun-Li и Guile, а также Balrog, Vega, Sagat и M. Bison, выступающие в качестве боссов и управляемых персонажей. Вас ждут захватывающие скоростные поединки: в Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting разработчики сбалансировали умения воинов и увеличили скорость боя. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

PT.name: Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
PT.description: Street Fighter II™ revolucionou o género dos jogos de luta nos anos 90. Considerado um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting foi o terceiro lançamento da série Street Fighter II original. Apresentando os oito guerreiros mundiais originais, incluindo Ryu, Chun-Li e Guile, mas também os personagens boss jogáveis Balrog, Vega, Sagat e M. Bison, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting oferece uma velocidade de jogo melhorada e um maior equilíbrio entre os personagens. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.
